content: it s hard to believe that a few simple granny hexagons can become the base of this modern cropped crochet sweater you ll combine meditative granny stitches and some magical crochet geometry to shape the sleeves and body with ease the included tips make it simple to customize the every aspect of the fit including making a longer pullover if you wish try it on as you go so there are no disappointments at the end just a sweater that feels perfectly you **this cropped hexagon sweater pattern pdf includes 42 pages of helpful content** - a clear written pattern in nine sizes xs-5x - link to a step-by-step video tutorial that covers the concepts - helpful instructional photos - printable labels to attach to hexagon sides as you work - invitation to our private community for pattern support ✨ learn how to crochet sweaters that always fit using our c r a f t framework 1 1 https //makeanddocrew com/no-fail-garments-crochet-course/
